Uses of Package
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf

  • Packages that use org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.favored  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc
    Tools to help define network clients and servers.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup  
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurationManager
    Maintains the set of all the classes which would like to get notified when the Configuration is reloaded from the disk in the Online Configuration Change mechanism, which lets you update certain configuration properties on-the-fly, without having to restart the cluster.
    ConfigurationObserver
    Every class that wants to observe changes in Configuration properties, must implement interface (and also, register itself with the ConfigurationManager object.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.favored 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurationObserver
    Every class that wants to observe changes in Configuration properties, must implement interface (and also, register itself with the ConfigurationManager object.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurationObserver
    Every class that wants to observe changes in Configuration properties, must implement interface (and also, register itself with the ConfigurationManager object.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurationObserver
    Every class that wants to observe changes in Configuration properties, must implement interface (and also, register itself with the ConfigurationManager object.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurationObserver
    Every class that wants to observe changes in Configuration properties, must implement interface (and also, register itself with the ConfigurationManager object.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurationManager
    Maintains the set of all the classes which would like to get notified when the Configuration is reloaded from the disk in the Online Configuration Change mechanism, which lets you update certain configuration properties on-the-fly, without having to restart the cluster.
    ConfigurationObserver
    Every class that wants to observe changes in Configuration properties, must implement interface (and also, register itself with the ConfigurationManager object.
    PropagatingConfigurationObserver
    This extension to ConfigurationObserver allows the configuration to propagate to the children of the current ConfigurationObserver.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurationObserver
    Every class that wants to observe changes in Configuration properties, must implement interface (and also, register itself with the ConfigurationManager object.
